scripts.gen-env-restate: echo "RESTATE_ADMIN_URL=http://$(dasel -f ./restate.toml -r toml 'admin.bind-address' | tr -d "'")" > ../../.env.restate && echo "RESTATE_INGRESS_URL=http://$(dasel -f ./restate.toml -r toml 'ingress.bind-address' | tr -d "'")" >> ../../.env.restate
scripts.restate-server: pnpm run restate-server-stop && pnpm run restate-server-start
scripts.register-deployment: sleep 5 && npx -y @restatedev/restate deployments register --environment local --use-http1.1 -y http://localhost:9080
scripts.dev: pnpm run gen-env-restate && (pnpm run register-deployment && pnpm run open-admin) & pnpm run restate-server & pnpm run wrangler-dev
